title: Common Mistakes
summary: Common mistakes to avoid when betting

body.raw:
1) forget about your assumptions. What should/is the descion maker think is what matters (trump+jre bet) 

2) do not focus on your potential profit - it makes you suceptible to longshot bias. Think about a bet in terms of *possible loss* given a **devised probability**.

3) aggressive betting is an easy shortcut to blowing up. do not bet a large percentage of your portfolio on a single bet. you can use a variation of the kelly criterion (consider mistake #2) to avoid this mistake.
